oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic Centre Wales Factsheet 4: Organic approved abattoirs, meat processors and livestock outlets
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Anon,
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Education, extension and communication
Values, standards and certification
Processing, packaging and transportation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Organic animals cannot be sold through the conventional market system. They must be slaughtered at an approved abattoir registered with an organic certification body. This factsheet lists approved abbatoirs throughout Wales along with contact details and services offered. This list is not exhaustive and we welcome additions.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Anon, (2002) Organic Centre Wales Factsheet 4: Organic approved abattoirs, meat processors and livestock outlets. Organic Centre Wales.
